title: Miro Integrations
content: https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017730993-Inserting-live-content-into-boards- https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017731233 https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408910669714 To use an integration, simply paste the URL onto the board. These are the integrations currently enabled for Miro that are documented: These are the integrations currently enabled for Miro and need to be documented: YouTube Jira Confluence Google Apps Docs Sheets Slides Looker Tableau
